name: OCTSHMUP: Overly complicated Tetris Shoot'em Up
name_original: OCTSHMUP: Overly complicated Tetris Shoot'em Up
description:
Shoot the falling buttons on the left, to control the Tetris board on the right!

Each time the player get hits by a button, a line is added to the Tetris board as penalty.
The game has a dynamic soundtrack, and the difficulty rises up every 3 complete lines.

Move with WASD.
Press Left Click or Right click to shoot from the left or the right.

Made by:
Robin Alonzo
Steven Lequient
Mathieu Merino
Erica Porter
Nicholas Vallejos
